name: ConeBlog – Elementor Blog Widgets
author: WPCone.com

sections.description:
ConeBlog Widgets is a collection of beautiful blog widgets for Elementor and WordPress. Highly customizable elements for Elementor page builder.
You can help us improve the plugin by providing your valuable feedback in our Facbook Community

You can create amazing blog layouts by using supported page builder with any theme of your choice. All the widgets are highly customizable with pre-designed layouts. Just drag and drop the widgets and play with the settings and make cool layouts.

Widgets Demo | Documentation

Free Widgets

  • Posts Grid
  • Posts List
  • Classic Posts
  • Posts Carousel
  • Posts Slider
  • Category Tiles
  • Author Card
  • News Ticker
  • …More widgets to be added soon.

Free Tools

  • Social Sharing: Enjoy beautiful social sharing tool and avoid installing more plugins.

Credits

Libraries and resources used in this project.
jQuery, Owl Carousel, Fontello Icons, Animate.css, Kirki Customizer Framework
sections.faq:
How to Install the Plugin

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Or you can install via WordPress Respository. Plugins > Add New & Type “coneblog” in search field.

Requirements

You Must Install and Activate Supported Page Builder (ie: Elementor) before installing this plugin.

How to get help

You can post in plugin forums Forums

How can I report security bugs?

You can report security bugs through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team help validate, triage and handle any security vulnerabilities. Report a security vulnerability.
sections.changelog:
1.5.0

  • Removed deprecated elementor methods

1.4.9

  • Fixed security issues

1.4.8

  • Shortcodes: REMOVED. We will add native WordPress widgets/blocks in the future version.
  • Widget Headings: Added typography settings

1.4.7

  • Fixed various CSS and layout Issues.
  • Updated Admin UI.
  • Added Border Radius option to various widgets.
  • Added Widget Heading option to various widgets.
  • Widget Headings: Add more styles
  • Widget Headings: Added Icon in Heading.
  • Category Tiles: Added Icon Spacing Option and fixed bugs.
  • Post Terms: Removed Icon and Fixed CSS issues.
  • Posts List: Added Links to thumbnails.
  • NOTE: Please clear all cache after updating the plugin.

1.4.5

  • security improvements

1.4.4

  • frameworks and 3rd party library updates

1.4.3

  • minor improvements

1.4.2

  • updated docs link
  • fixed some typography issues
  • fixed social sharing position in single posts

1.4.1

  • Fixed social sharing default values

1.4.0

  • Fixed fatal error while updating

1.3.0

  • New Element: News Ticker.
  • New Layout: Classic Block Layout 3.
  • New Feature: Social Sharing.
  • Bug Fixes: Fixed some bugs related to styling.
  • Removed FontAwesome: FontAwesome library is removed and loaded custom icons to improve performance.
  • Meta Color: added option to change post meta text color.
  • Layout Features: Added various new features in elementor widgets to further control the layout of the elements.

1.2.0

  • Added font-awesome library and fixed some bugs

1.1.0

  • New widgets added (Posts Slider, Author Card).
  • Introducing Shortcodes (Now use ConeBlog widgets with any page builder).
  • Improved asset loading.
  • Customizer Options to style shortcode widgets.

1.0.0

  • Plugin has been released.
